text:
Hello,

What is your experience, what is the expected average response time of a HubSpot serverless feature?
I ask because we are experiencing that a simple serverless function (which only has one response) is 400-600ms.
A function that includes a HubDB call is 2 seconds.
For a payment process where we need to send 3-4 API requests in a serverless function, it takes 7 seconds.
If we build our own nodejs server, the same calls total 700ms.
Our question is how to speed up the response time of serverless function?

Thanks!
